advancements.minecard.tutorial.title: Learned
advancements.minecard.win.title: Victory
advancements.minecard.win_ai.description: Win a game against the AI
advancements.minecard.win_ai.title: Man vs Machine
card_ability.minecard.absorption_potion: Select a card from the board and give it shield.
card_ability.minecard.amethyst_shard: Draw a card. Deal damage equal to the cost of the drawn card to a random enemy card on the board.
card_ability.minecard.bamboo: Grow: Give all pands on the board +2/+2.
card_ability.minecard.bat: Attack: Heal your player for one health.
card_ability.minecard.blaze: Attack: Apply 3 burn to the target.
card_ability.minecard.buried_treasure: Death: Gain a random treasure card.
card_ability.minecard.cat: Tick: 50% chance to give you a gift.
card_ability.minecard.cave_spider: Attack: 50% chance to poison the target.
card_ability.minecard.chest: Draw 3 cards, but increase their cost by 1.
card_ability.minecard.chicken: Summon: 50% chance to gain an egg.
card_ability.minecard.cod: Summon: Chance to summon another Cod.
card_ability.minecard.cow: Death: Gain a milk bucket card.
card_ability.minecard.creeper: Death: Explode and deal 3 damage to adjacent cards.
card_ability.minecard.egg: Throw the egg at a selected card on the board, dealing 1 damage and 50% chance to summon a chicken.
card_ability.minecard.elder_guardian: Summon: Reduce the attack of all enemy cards on the board by 1.
card_ability.minecard.enchanted_book: Draw a card, and give it +2/+2.
card_ability.minecard.enchanted_golden_a: Give a selected friendly card on the board 6 health, shield, and remove burn.
card_ability.minecard.end_crystal: Tick: Heal adjacent Ender Dragons by 4.
card_ability.minecard.ender_dragon:
Summon: Create two end crystals.
Tick: Deal 1 damage to all enemy cards on the board.
card_ability.minecard.ender_pearl: Select a friendly card from the board and return it to your hand.
card_ability.minecard.enderman: Summon: Copy a random card from the enemy hand.
card_ability.minecard.endermite: Summon: Draw an Enderman from your deck.
card_ability.minecard.evoker: Summon: Deal 2 damage to all enemy cards on the board.
card_ability.minecard.fire_charge: Select a card from the board and give it 3 burn.
card_ability.minecard.fishing_rod: Steal a selected card from the enemy hand.
card_ability.minecard.fox: Summon: Spawn a sweet berries card.
card_ability.minecard.ghast: Summon: Apply 4 burn to the enemy player.
card_ability.minecard.glow_squid: Summon: Reveal all cards on the board.
card_ability.minecard.goat: Summon: Return an enemy card to their hand.
card_ability.minecard.healing_potion: Select a card from the board and heal it by 5.
card_ability.minecard.hoglin: Summon: Either gain +1/+1 and taunt, or summon a 4/3 Hoglin baby.
card_ability.minecard.husk: Attack: Reduce the attack of your target by 2.
card_ability.minecard.iron_boots: Select a card from the board and give it 2 health.
card_ability.minecard.iron_sword: Select a card from the board and give it 2 attack.
card_ability.minecard.leather_chestplate: Select a card from the board and give it 2 health.
card_ability.minecard.llama: Summon: Deal 1 damage to a selected card on the board.
card_ability.minecard.magma_cube: Attack: Apply 2 burn to the target.
card_ability.minecard.mooshroom: Summon: Gain a mushroom stew card.
card_ability.minecard.mushroom_stew: Select a card from the board and make it grow up instantly.
card_ability.minecard.ocelot: Summon: Scare all enemy Phantoms and Creepers.
card_ability.minecard.packed_ice: Select a card from the board and freeze it.
card_ability.minecard.pig: Death: Heal your player for 3 health.
card_ability.minecard.piglin: Summon: Gain a random barter card.
card_ability.minecard.pillager: Summon: Give adjacent cards +1/+1 and taunt.
card_ability.minecard.pointed_dripstone: Select a card from the board and give it 3 thorns.
card_ability.minecard.poison_potion: Select a card from the board and give it poison.
card_ability.minecard.rabbit_foot: Select a card from the board and give it 1 health.
card_ability.minecard.ravager: Attack: Also deal damage to the cards adjacent to the target.
card_ability.minecard.rotten_flesh: Select a card from the board and either heal or hurt it, choosen randomly.
card_ability.minecard.salmon: Death: 50% chance to pick up the Salmon in a bucket.
card_ability.minecard.scute: Give a selected card from the board 5 health and taunt.
card_ability.minecard.sheep: Death: Summon a wool card for the enemy.
card_ability.minecard.silverfish: Hurt: Draw a Silverfish from your deck.
card_ability.minecard.skeleton: Tick: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy card on the board.
card_ability.minecard.skeleton_horse: Summon: Deal 2 damage and apply 2 burn to a random enemy card on the board.
card_ability.minecard.snow_golem: Summon: Deal 2 damage and freeze a selected enemy card from the board.
card_ability.minecard.soul_sand: Deal X damage to the enemy board. X = number of enemy cards on the board.
card_ability.minecard.spider: Death: Increase the cost of a random card from the enemy hand by 1.
card_ability.minecard.splash_potion_of_h: Deal 3 damage to 2 random enemy cards on the board.
card_ability.minecard.splitter: Death: Split into 2 smaller versions of itself.
card_ability.minecard.spyglass: Discover a card from the enemy hand. Set its cost to 10.
card_ability.minecard.squid: Hurt: Return this card to your hand.
card_ability.minecard.strider: Summon: Remove burn from adjacent cards.
card_ability.minecard.sweet_berries: Death: Gain a sweet berries card.
card_ability.minecard.throw_sweet_berrie: Select a card from the board and heal it by 4.
card_ability.minecard.trader_llama: Summon: Either deal 2 damage to a selected card on the board, or draw a card.
card_ability.minecard.trader_llama_spit: Deal 2 damage to a selected card on the board.
card_ability.minecard.trident: Deal 4 damage and apply 4 burn to a selected card from the board. 30% chance to return this card to your hand.
card_ability.minecard.witch: Summon: Gain a random potion card.
card_ability.minecard.wither: Tick: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy card.
card_ability.minecard.wither_skeleton: Summon: Reduce the cost of your Wither by two.
card_ability.minecard.zoglin: Death: Gain a rotten flesh card.
card_ability.minecard.zombie: Summon: Gain a random piece of equipment.
card_ability.minecard.zombie_villager: Summon: Give all your undead cards on the board +2/+2.
card_property.minecard.burn.description: Take 1 damage every turn until burn ends
card_property.minecard.charge.descriptio: Can attack immediately after being played
card_property.minecard.freeze.descriptio: Decreases by 1 every turn, can not attack while frozen
card_property.minecard.poison.descriptio: Take 1 damage every turn, but cannot kill
card_property.minecard.special.descripti: Special property depending on the creature
card_property.minecard.stealth.descripti: Can not be attacked until card has attacked
card_property.minecard.taunt.description: Must be killed before other cards can be attacked
card_property.minecard.undead.descriptio: The card belongs to the undead category
chat.minecard.game_interactions:
Use [item] to interact with game:
* Deck item: Enter the game
* Redstone dust: Add an AI opponent to the game
* Planks: Start a tutorial game
chat.minecard.not_enough_cards: You need a full deck to enter the game.
chat.minecard.too_many_duplicates: Too many copies of %s in the deck (max = %s).
gui.minecard.tutorial0: Hello there! My name is Cardy the Creeper and I am here to teach you about the card game. First I will teach you about the cards themselves!
gui.minecard.tutorial1: Also! If I get in the way, you can easily drag me around with the mouse. But be careful, because I am ticklish!
gui.minecard.tutorial10: Enough about the cards! Let's move on to the rest of the game.
gui.minecard.tutorial11: This bottom half is your part of the game space.
gui.minecard.tutorial12: This is your deck. At the start of your turn, you automatically draw one card from your deck.
gui.minecard.tutorial14: The game always starts with a mulligan phase, where you get to select which cards you want to replace from the starting hand.
gui.minecard.tutorial15: All the cards in the tutorial deck are identical, so it does not matter if you replace cards or not.
gui.minecard.tutorial16: Click on the 'Confirm' button to complete the mulligan phase and continue with the tutorial.
gui.minecard.tutorial17: This is your part of the board.
gui.minecard.tutorial18: Each player always start with one card on the board, the player card. When you kill the opponent player card, you win the game.
gui.minecard.tutorial19: Usually the player card has %s health, but I have reduced it to 1 so the tutorial won't drag on for too long!
gui.minecard.tutorial2: Oh look, that's me! Wait, something seems off..
gui.minecard.tutorial20: Here are your resources. These are drained when you play cards. When a new turn starts your resources are restored, and you gain 1 more total.
gui.minecard.tutorial21: Let's try playing a card! Click on one of the cards in your hand, and then click somewhere on your board.
gui.minecard.tutorial22: Great work! As you might have noticed, an activity entry was added here to the left when you played a card.
gui.minecard.tutorial23: Every time you or the opponent plays a card, attacks, or a card ability comes into effect, an entry is added, which you can use to see if you missed anything important.
gui.minecard.tutorial24: If you hover over an entry, you will get the details of what happened.
gui.minecard.tutorial25: Now, back to the game at hand! Unfortunately, played cards need one turn to get ready before they can attack, so not much more to do than to end the turn.
gui.minecard.tutorial26: Click on the end turn button!
gui.minecard.tutorial27: Usually this is when the opponent will make their move, but fortunately for you, the AI is programmed to just pass their turn during the tutorial.
gui.minecard.tutorial28: Now your card is ready to attack! Click on it, and then click on the enemy card to attack it and end the tutorial!
gui.minecard.tutorial29: Good job! You have completed the tutorial! Now get out there and collect some cards and play against new opponents :)
gui.minecard.tutorial3: There, much better. Now, let the teaching begin!
gui.minecard.tutorial4: This value determines how much it costs to play the card.
gui.minecard.tutorial5: This value determines how much damage the card can take before it dies.
gui.minecard.tutorial6: This value determines how much damage the card does when it attacks.
gui.minecard.tutorial7: The column to the right of the card lists all the special properties a card has. For example, this card has thorns, so it will deal extra damage when attacked.
gui.minecard.tutorial8: You can hover over this button at any time during the game to see a list of all the different properties.
gui.minecard.tutorial9: This area describes any abilities the card has. Abilities have a trigger and an effect. In this case, the trigger is 'attack', which means the effect will happen every time the card attacks.
